channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for Sky News, 11–16 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 39.5–45.4%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 19.9–24.8%
  • Scottish Labour: 16.9–21.6%
  • Scottish Greens: 5.7–8.7%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 3.9–6.5%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation for Scotland in Union, 9–12 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 36.0–42.0%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 18.6–23.6%
  • Scottish Labour: 17.6–22.6%
  • Scottish Greens: 8.3–12.0%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 6.5–9.9%
